pages.text: One of my absolute favorite building blocks/decorations are called patches. There’s dirt, mossy dirt, podzol, gravel, sand, red sand, snow and ice.$(br2)You probably know what I’m talking about if you’ve been inside the caves! You can stack it in thin layers all the way up as tall as you want; even though slightly redundant. Aside from making the general

terrain a little more realistic and ridged, I personally use them as slabs sometimes! You know, if you wanted a gravel slab you could just stack is until it’s as tall as a normal one. Same with all the other types!
